replies.msg:
#LFC statement: "The thoughts of everyone at LFC are with Sir Alex Ferguson and his family..... a great rival but also a great friend who supported this club during its most difficult time, it is hoped that Sir Alex will make a full recovery."


çœŸä¿‚å¾—é€£ç™»ä»”å’æ’šåƒåœ¾

Manchester City and Liverpool have shown their class by offering messages of goodwill to United legend Sir Alex Ferguson.

Blues captain Vincent Kompany led the clubs' tributes to Ferguson after he was rushed to hospital on Saturday to undergo emergency surgery for a brain haemorrhage.

Liverpool have also wished the former Reds manager a ‘speedy recovery’.
